title: LibGuides: Drug Information: CAM
author: Rachael Lebo
cleaned_text: in a new window Uses a standardized evidence grading system for herbal, dietary, mind-body, exercise, and other integrative therapies, reviews available evidence from studies, expert opinion and tradition. Summaries of findings are provided in varied levels of depth and detail to suit general readers, primary care providers, pharmacists, chiropractors, and others. (Incorporates the former Natural Standard)
